content:
<@491624610215886849> I may have seen a ghost in kurtosis tests
```
[cl-1-lighthouse-erigon] Feb 11 16:32:23.011 ERRO Unable to check genesis execution payload, error: ExecutionLayerGetBlockByNumberFailed(EngineError(Api { error: Json(Error("missing field `totalDifficulty`", line: 0, column: 0)) })), service: slot_notifier
```
`totalDifficulty` isn't a part of the api anymore
